item.description:
I know there is already a meet up for Sunday morning but Sunday is good for me and there is a waiting list for the Swift River Meetup. Hopefully some of those on the wait list will join us on the Quaboag.

We will meet at the boat launch at the intersection of RT 9 and RT 67. When you turn off of RT 9 on to 67 there is a break in the guard rail before the bridge. There may be no sign. There is a good size parking lot. The launch area is in the back corner near the river.

I plan on paddling up towards White's Landing then back to the launch at RT 67. I am guessing it will take 1 1/2 to 2 hours to get to Whites Landing. If any one wants a shorter paddle they can go one way. If you plan on going one way please arrive by 8:15 to unload and get your car to the other ramp.

If any one has time and wants to go longer we can paddle the other direction for a ways.

I paddle in the rain but will cancel if there are thunderstorms predicted for the morning.
item.name: Quaboag River W. Brookfield, MA
